member.name: M:Week12_WebAPI.Controllers.ExercisesController.GetAsync
member.summary: Get a list with all to-do items.
member.response: Returns a list with the available to-do items.

member.name: M:Week12_WebAPI.Controllers.ExercisesController.CreateAsync(Lab09Smetana.ViewModels.ExerciseDTO)
member.response: Indicates that a validation error occurred.

member.name: M:Week12_WebAPI.Controllers.ExercisesController.DeleteAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete the specified to-do item. Note: Use of TypedResults means we do not need to specify ResponseType.
member.response: Specified to-do item was not found.

members.member: Data Transfer Object for transferring message data.
Gets or sets the unique identifier of the message.
Gets or sets the unique identifier of the recipient account.
Gets or sets the recipient account associated with the message.
Gets or sets the unique identifier of the sender account.
Gets or sets the sender account associated with the message.
Gets or sets the content of the message.
